item.title: Any Musicians Here?
item.author: invalid@example.com (~Marzanna~)
item.dc:creator: ~Marzanna~
item.content:encoded:
Hai hai~! Marzanna here!
I'm curious if there is any musicians here. If so, what instrument do you enjoy playing and how long have you played it for?

I enjoying playing the piano, I really love it.
I've been playing for about 3 years, I still need more to improve! ;-;
Trying to play Touhou music is a big pain!
